# CHANGES

## Next

## 0.0.10

- Feature: Support aggregations w/o conditions on first/last bin of a column
- Feature: Support bin for aggregations w/ condition on first/last bin of a column
- Minor: Correct CASE WHEN..THEN..ELSE..END for DsCalculatedColumnExpr

## 0.0.8

- Feature: String parser - STRING{anything here except "{" and "}" }
- Feature: Static expression - DATE_ADD(value, amount, unit)
- Feature: Static expression - DATE_START_OF(value, unit)
- Feature: Static expression - DATE_END_OF(value, unit)

## 0.0.7

- Feature: Static expression - TODAY()
- Feature: Static expression - YESTERDAY()
- Feature: Static expression - DATE_THIS(unit)
- Feature: Static expression - DATE_LAST(value, unit)
- Feature: Static expression - FORMAT(type,formatString)
- Bugfix: DsQueryExpression - Fix combined expression to return column name in string instead of array

## 0.0.6

- Feature: Null value expression
- Feature: Boolean expression
- Feature: Date expression
- Feature: Invalid expression error now contains a message indicating where and why it failed
- Minor: COUNTIF,SUMIF,AVGIF,... alias is now optional

## 0.0.5

- Feature: DsCalculatedColumnExpression - CASE WHEN <Condition> THEN <value> ELSE <value>
- Feature: DsCalculatedColumnExpression - @Column1 + | - | * | / @Column2
- Minor: Added 2 more quote style (\`) (") for string expression. Ex: "any string with/without space", \`any string with/without space\`...

## 0.0.4

- Feature: DsQueryExpression quick method - COUNT() | COUNT() as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression quick method - SUM(@column) | SUM(@column) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression quick method - AVG(@column) | AVG(@column) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression quick method - MIN(@column) | MIN(@column) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression quick method - MAX(@column) | MAX(@column) as alias

## 0.0.3

- Feature: DsQueryExpression default filter - COUNTIF() as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression default filter - SUMIF(@column) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression default filter - AVGIF(@column) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression default filter - MINIF(@column) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression default filter - MAXIF(@column) as alias
- Feature: List Expression - $expr1, $expr2, $expr3, $expr4
- Minor: Combined Expression alias - Now need to add parentheses before alias. Ex: ($expr1 + ($expr2 - $expr3) * $expr4 / $expr5 ^ $expr6) as alias

## 0.0.2

- Feature: Column indentifier - For now, column name must start with "@".
- Feature: String without single quotes - Single quotes are only needed when the string contains spaces.

## 0.0.1

- Feature: DsQueryExpression - COUNTIF($condition, $dv_or_ds_id) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression - SUMIF($column, $condition, $dv_or_ds_id) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression - AVGIF($column, $condition, $dv_or_ds_id) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression - MINIF($column, $condition, $dv_or_ds_id) as alias
- Feature: DsQueryExpression - MAXIF($column, $condition, $dv_or_ds_id) as alias
- Feature: Combined Expression - $expr1 + ($expr2 - $expr3) * $expr4 / $expr5 ^ $expr6 as alias

## 0.0.0

- Feature: Init
